definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: Democratic government gradually take the place of an all-powerful monarchy.
sentences.chinese: 民主政府逐渐取代了强大的君主制。

sentences.english: The monarchies now left in Asia can be counted on the fingers of one hand.
sentences.chinese: 现在在亚洲的君主国已廖廖无几。

sentences.english: 1910 - Portugal overthrows its monarchy and declares itself a republic.
sentences.chinese: 1910年的今天，葡萄牙推翻君主制宣布共和。

sentences.english: If he does not lose the heart of the people, his virtues will flourish.
sentences.chinese: 君主不失掉人心，德政就能传播四万。

sentences.english: If the ruler appoints virtuous men of experience and age, myriad affairs will be well managed.
sentences.chinese: 君主信任年高德助的老臣，万事都能治好。

sentences.english: The sovereign can never act unjustly, why?
sentences.chinese: 君主不可能永远做到公正，为什么？

sentences.english: One-Inch arrived at the house of one of England's great lords.
sentences.chinese: 小不点在英国一个君主的屋子前停了下来。

sentences.english: Hannan also says the monarchy is part of the British national identity.
sentences.chinese: 汉纳还表示君主制是英国国民身份的一部分。

sentences.english: Feudal and monarchical maladies no longer run in our blood.
sentences.chinese: 在我们的血液里已不再存在封建制和君主制的病害。

sentences.english: The monarch was ousted by a military coup.
sentences.chinese: 那君主被军事政变者废黜了。

sentences.english: That’s a sad part of the remoteness of the monarchy.
sentences.chinese: 那表现出了君主统治远隔性的悲哀部分。

sentences.english: What money he could lay his hands on, he spent like an Indian rajah.
sentences.chinese: 只要他能够搞到钱，他挥金如土就像印度君主那样。

sentences.english: Let's look at the following meaning attached by the monarchy will aid fringe patterns of behavior in public life.
sentences.chinese: 下面再来看君主援经义附会缘饰政事的行为模式。

sentences.english: Supporting China's feudal dynasty monarch known as the highest official in charge of the state.
sentences.chinese: 我国封建王朝辅助君主掌管国事的最高官员的通称。

sentences.english: Theoretically, the monarch embodies supremacy as head of state. P130
sentences.chinese: 理论上，君主如同国家元首般享有至高无上的权力。

sentences.english: He was a kingly and kindly figure, benevolent but not uninvolved.
sentences.chinese: 他有一副君主的与和善的面貌，慈悲，但陷入里面去。

definition: the imperial court/the government in imperial times
former kings/former emperors/in Confucian writing, refers esp. to the sage rulers Yao 堯|尧[Yao2], Shun 舜[Shun4], Yu 禹[Yu3], Tang 湯|汤[Tang1] and the kings of Zhou
